static.dragon_doors.name: Dragon Doors
static.dragon_doors.description: Two giant golden doors stand in front of you. There is a jade carving of a dragon breathing fire that was created with the finest craftsmanship. There is a slot for a special kind of dragon key. Perhaps if you find the dragon key, you can unlock these doors.

static.waterfall.name: Waterfall
static.waterfall.description: The water crashes down at immense speeds. Going through could really hurt without a good helmet.

static.pit.name: Pit
static.pit.description: It's a pitch black, giant gaping pit. If it's not bottomless, then it goes down a long way.

messages.jump_death: You jump into the pit. After about 30 seconds of falling you realize it's a bottomless pit and you'll be falling for quite some time. Eventually you hit the bottom long after you reached terminal velocity. Your death happens instantaneously.

static.pedestal.name: Pedestal
static.pedestal.description: The pedestal is made out of a black volcanic stone. There is an inscription on it but you cannot read it.

messages.item_on_pedestal: There is {item} sitting on the pedestal.

static.moss.name: Moss
static.moss.description: The moss covers the wall in patches in some spots but is very dense in others. You touch the moss and get your hands all wet!

messages.hidden_gold_found: A few gold coins are hidden in the denser portion of the moss.
